NEW DELHI - 110001 
Dated: 07/01/2014 
 
AVSEC CIRCULAR NO: 01/2014 
 
Subject: Vehicle facility at airports in respect of Shri Shatrughan Sinha, Member of Parliament 
Lok Sabha. 
  
Shri Shatrughan Sinha, Member of Parliament, Lok Sabha be provided the facility of 
airport-vehicle that can ferry him from airport terminal to the aircraft and vice-versa at all those 
airports where such a facility exists, for the period of three months w.e.f. 15/12/2013. 
 
This issues with the approval of Commissioner of Security (CA). 
 
 
 
 
(Raja Srivastava, IPS) 
Addl. Commissioner of Security (CA) 
 
 
Distribution :  As per list attached. 
 
Copy to :- 
 
MCA (Shri S V Ramanna, U/Secretary), RG Bhawan, New Delhi.
